items.solution_html: The correct leaf is the eighth from the left. Note that darker blue indicates higher probability of red, and darker orange indicates higher probability of white. In the terminal node, there are 5 instances of white and 987 instances of red. Hence the estimated probability is 5/(987 + 5) = 0.005.
